warnings: Beneficiary not specified — CRITICAL. If beneficiary is outdated, the wrong person may receive these funds.
Account number not provided — family will need this to contact Fidelity.
Family has exactly 60 DAYS to elect COBRA continuation coverage after death. Miss this deadline and health insurance is lost forever.
Call Acme Corp HR immediately to begin COBRA election.
No beneficiary designated — HSA funds transfer tax-free to a designated beneficiary.
If no beneficiary is named, the HSA becomes part of the estate and may be taxed.
User said 'I think they give us some' — coverage amount and provider are completely unknown.
Most ADP-administered employers include $50K–$150K group term life insurance.
Family MUST contact HR to find the policy number and file a claim. Billions in life insurance goes unclaimed every year because families don't know it exists.
This is a secured debt — tied to the vehicle only.
Family is NOT personally liable unless they co-signed the loan.
Do NOT let debt collectors tell the family they must pay this.
These will keep charging the deceased's card indefinitely. Cancel immediately.

missing.reason: User did not mention paid time off or vacation days.
missing.why_it_matters: In many states (especially California), unused PTO must be paid out to the estate. With 3 years of employment, this could be worth $2,000–$10,000+. Contact HR to check the PTO balance.

missing.reason: User did not mention Accidental Death & Dismemberment insurance.
missing.why_it_matters: 90% of workers don't know they have AD&D insurance. It's almost always bundled free with group life insurance. Could mean an additional $50K–$150K payout if death was accidental.

missing.reason: User did not mention stock options or RSUs.
missing.why_it_matters: If Acme Corp offers equity compensation, vested shares are part of the estate. Unvested shares may be forfeited. Check the equity portal or HR.

missing.reason: User did not mention pension or defined benefit plan.
missing.why_it_matters: Some employers still offer pension plans. A surviving spouse may be entitled to survivor benefits. Check with HR.

missing.reason: User did not mention short-term or long-term disability insurance.
missing.why_it_matters: Not directly relevant after death, but if there was a period of disability before death, there may be uncollected benefits.
